title: The Evil Within Vol. 1
description: In a hellish mindscape where her greatest fears become chilling reality, one girl stands alone! When college student Dana Robinson wakes, lost and abandoned, in a world of twisted nightmares, can she overcome her fears - and a ton of truly horrific foes - to make it out with body and mind intact? EVIL takes hold in the official comic tie-in to the most hotly anticipated game of 2014- The Evil Within!
author: Alex  Sanchez
